infos.value: Father!
No. I shall be the one to go to Wezette.
F-Father!?
I will lead «Solidus» and set out immediately.
Should Muraga or Sadali take any suspicious actions, I will crush them at once.
I do have one request to make of you, Machérie.
I am concerned about Dario.
About my brother?
Muraga is most certainly aware that our main military forces are away from the castle.
If what you say is true, and Dario's wife Vinera is not truly related to Muraga by blood...
There is little doubt she will see this unrest as an opportunity to act. You must put a stop to whatever scheme she may enact.
I understand. I shall pay him a visit at once.
I believe you to be a better judge of character than I.
Father...
I hope someday that I might share a drink with this Mont of yours.
Now, we must both depart.
Yes, Father!
Halt!
Where are you going?
That's none of your concern. Step aside.
Should you choose not to...
Planning on returning to Hourne Castle, are we?
If so, you'll have to go through us!
